name: Space Circus Shootout
description:
Made for No More Sweden 2015 - the theme cards we drew were "Chainsaw clowns from SPACE" and "Wild West" so we decided to make a game about space clowns fighting land-wars on Mars.

The game is basically a cross between solitaire and rock-paper-scissors but with more chainsaws.

  • Programming, music: Philip 'FallenMaster' Wallin
  • Artwork, voice "acting": William 'wilbefast' Dyce

The project is available on bitbucket. Code is under MIT, assets are CC-BY-3.0.
